title: Celebrating 7 Years of TCA With Fratello Cigars
itunes:title: Celebrating 7 Years of TCA With Fratello Cigars
description:
7 Years ago to the day, The Cigar Authority launched with David Garofalo and Mr. Jonathan and over the years things have changed, while the show might not have gotten better. We seem to have hit our stride with Chuck Morrison producing and Barry Stein taking a swing at every piece of low hanging fruit.

We are joined in studio with Omar de Frias of Fratello Cigars as we light up two different Fratello cigars including one that is the first cigar from the April care package.

We will look back at the history of the show, and look to the future of what The Cigar Authority might bring during our 7th season.

We will also have Chuck getting Debonaire, Barry with the News, Mr. Jonathan steps into the Asylum and the show gets a new opening…

Join us on the longest actively running Cigar Podcast, The Cigar Authority
